attributes.action: DEFUND THE BBC AND MAKE THEM GAIN REVENUE BY ADVERTISING.
attributes.additional_details: The Government needs to realise that The BBC are now too powerful in their political and social bias.The money saved from defending could supply much need Police recruits or support the NHS recruitment.
attributes.background: Want the Government to be strong and take a stance against a bloated biased Corporation,pass a bill defending them of taxpayers money They should advertise to secure income and revenue

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/331189
